iOS Projects.name: Chef Top
iOS Projects.description: Chef Top is an app that helps you level up in the kitchen progressively! It doesn't matter if you're a master or a noob: Chef Top will have a challenge for you.

iOS Projects.name: Sensorio
iOS Projects.description: Sensorio is an universal city guide focused on describing places using a simple language that can be expressed and understood by anyone.

iOS Projects.name: apponym
iOS Projects.description: apponym provides an environment that encourages you to say how you feel – even if you're not okay – and makes it easy to reach out and send good energies to people in need of it!

iOS Projects.name: perfamily
iOS Projects.description: perFamily is a tvOS trivia game that puts to test your knowledge about your loved ones. Do you think you know your family? Do you want to know them further? Download perFamily and find out.

iOS Projects.name: Molecada
iOS Projects.description: Molecada is a platform that brings traditional child plays back to life in the tvOS. Tradition and technology do not need to be apart from each other!
